did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Bibliography of Keith Davis's work, as well as a manuscript of Davis's autobiography, and Davis's Administrative Letters issued during his presidency of the Academy of Management.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Keith Davis was Professor of Management at Arizona Ustate University, as well as Past President of the Academy of Management, Western Academy of Management, and Sigma Iota Epsilon.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a bibliography of Keith Davis's work, manuscript of Davis's autobiography, and Davis's Administrative Letters issued during his presidency of the Academy of Management.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Keith Davis Papers #5772m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
